name: Magic War - Castle Defense
description:
Magic War - Castle Defense is an exciting mobile castle defense game. Wake up the warrior in you and help our prince save his castle and his kingdom!
The castle is under attack and you must help the Prince save his castle and his kingdom.
Magic War - Castle Defense is a challenging, fantasy-action game. It is thrilling, full of dangerous magical creatures and their powerful bosses!
Make a solid strategy and help the prince save his castle!

The STORY — Magic War - Castle Defense is the story of the brave prince and how he fights and defends his castle and kingdom, from various evil magical creatures.
The peaceful kingdom and its prince are under attack by an evil wizard and his army of magical creatures. The wizard is sending wave after wave of powerful enemies, each tougher than the other.
But with your help the Prince will be brave and defend his castle and his kingdom from the strong army of magical creatures.

A challenging game, Magic War - Castle Defense is based on simple bow and arrow archery game physics. To play the game, just pull back the bow with your finger, aim at the enemy and release the arrow to shoot. You have limited arrows for each level, so aim perfectly! Make sure you have a good strategy to clear each level!
Unlock magical powers of Fire, Freeze and Blast and upgrade them to make them more powerful as you play the many levels.
Upgrade your bow and arrows and even your castle. Arm yourself with the deadliest weapons, an indestructible defence and an even stronger strategy!

FEATURES of Magic War - Castle Defense :
— mobile castle defence game
— fantasy action game
— magical creatures
— boss fights
— beautiful 2D environment
— 4 stunning seasons - summer, winter, spring and autumn
— bow and arrow game physics
— strategy based game
— enemy waves
